DB","reporter":{"login":"ykoval","$type":"User"},"wikifiedDescription":"

NOTES: according to business logic, KT pays salaries in til 5th day of current month for previous month

Steps to reproduce:

  • there is open payment for previous month (ex. APRIL)
  • change any Metadata element (ex. CORPORATE CARD WIRE PERCENT) in current month (ex. MAY)

Expected behaviour:

  • Payment will be calculated with changed Metadata elements value (ex. for MAY)

Actual:

  • Payment is calculated with previous Metadata elements value (ex. for APRIL)
","id":"2-2530","$type":"Issue","workItems":[]}]
